Headline: Loop-bound BrownLine Service Delayed at Kimball
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to mechanicl problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to mechanicl problem on the train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
